bill.title: Hawaii Public Housing Authority; Disposition of Abandoned Property
bill.description: Expands the Hawaii public housing authority's power to dispose of property seized, abandoned, or remaining upon eviction in and at public housing projects, elder or elderly housing, or state low-income housing projects. Effective 7/1/2050. (SD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to HSG, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Monday, 02-02-15 8:30AM in House conference room 329.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Jordan, Creagan, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Oshiro, Fukumoto Chang; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 19) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Har, Matsumoto, Tokioka excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-12-15 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, San Buenaventura, Brower, Creagan, Hashem, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Nakashima, Takayama, Woodson, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 401) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Ito excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-27-15 1:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Cachola, Cullen, DeCoite, Johanson, Jordan, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, Lowen, Onishi, Yamashita, Pouha, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 690), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Keohokalole voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 76).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HSH/CPN, WAM.
The committee(s) on HSH/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-15 1:15PM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on HSH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HSH were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Harimoto, Riviere; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Green, Slom.
The committee(s) on CPN deferred the measure until 03-20-15 10:00AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Kidani, Nishihara, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Kahele, Slom.
Reported from HSH/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 989) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-06-15 9:05AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Kouchi, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Galuteria, Harimoto, Inouye, Riviere, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ruderman.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1440) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-14-15.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 571) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).

Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Tuesday 04-28-15 10:30AM in conference room 229.
